snippet: European Parliament lawmakers stopped short of banning the practice entirely, albeit by a narrow margin.
abstract: European Parliament sides with fishing industry by narrowly voting against an overall ban on deep-sea trawling, but agrees to restrict some of worst excesses of practice.
lead_paragraph: European Parliament lawmakers stopped short of banning the practice entirely, albeit by a narrow margin.

headline.main: Europe Moves to Prohibit Some Deep-Sea Trawling
headline.print_headline: Europe Moves to Prohibit Some Deep-Sea Trawling
